attributes.additional_details:
Tony Blair was less than transparent during his term in office as Prime Minister. He misled the British public over the years invasion of Iraq and weapons of mass destruction. 
He created a situation whereby known terrorists and murderers were pardoned and decent men, acting under orders became targets and scapegoats for his governments failings.
attributes.background: Reconsider the award of Tony Blair,s knighthood and rescind the award.

rejection.details: We can't accept petitions that relate to honours and appointments, which includes calling for an honour to be removed.
